content:
Play after making two successful consecutive melee Strikes against the same target with two different weapons.

The target takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} until the bleeding stops. If you are 7th level or higher, increase the bleed to @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success]. If you are 12th level or higher, increase the bleed to @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed3d6.success].
name: Rending Swipe
